channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for RI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for RI

item.title: Report E-2024010477
item.description:
Report E-2024010477

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-30T15:10:41+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-17
  • City: CRANSTON
  • State: RI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: It was reported that due to a nail puncture, approximately 2 cups of Potassium Hydroxide Solution (hazardous - UN1814) was released. The released product was contained to the dock floor. The terminal reviewed the SDS and it was decided the terminal was capable of cleaning the spill with PPE onsite.. The released product, damaged pail, and oil-dri were placed into a 20-gallon poly drum and staged in OS&D. There were no drains, soils or waterways reported to have been impacted by the release.
